naslov: Kučine, LUKSUZNA VILA / PANORAMSKI POGLED (blizina Splita) čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna nekretnina agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Luksuzna vila sagrađena je 2019.godine na ograđenom posjedu od 521 metara kvadratnih. - Stambeno 300m2 Nalazi se u podnožju planine Mosor u neposrednoj blizini grada Splita, antičke Salone, aerodoroma Resnik-Split, te priključka na autocestu Zagreb-Dubrovnik. Vila je podobna za stambenu namjenu ili turizam. // DETALJI NA UPIT // Najbliža zračna luka: Split-Resnik 19 km Najbliži izlaz na autocestu: A1- izlaz Dugopolje/Split 2,5 km Najbliža trajektna luka: Split 7 km Najbliži gradovi: Split 6 km, Solin 3 km, Omiš 20 km Najbliža plaža: Stobreč 2,5 km, Split 6 km ........................................................................................................... - exclusive real estate agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the selling price Dear clients, a tour of the property is possible only with a signed brokerage agreement which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, all in accordance with the Real Estate Brokerage Act. The luxury villa was built in 2019 on a fenced property of 521 square meters. - Residential 300m2 It is located at the foot of the mountain Mosor near the city of Split, the ancient Salona, the airport Resnik-Split, and the connection to the highway Zagreb-Dubrovnik. The villa is suitable for residential or tourism. // DETAILS ON REQUEST // Nearest airport: Split-Resnik 19 km Nearest motorway exit: A1- Dugopolje / Split exit 2.5 km Nearest ferry port: Split 7 km Nearest cities: Split 6 km, Solin 3 km, Omis 20 km Nearest beach: Stobreč 2.5 km, Split 6 km #adriaINgroup realestate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
